comment: Absolutely stunning views of the Gateway of India! Worth every penny. The service was impeccable.
managerReply: Thank you for your kind words, John! We pride ourselves on delivering excellence. We hope to see you again soon.

comment: The Royal Bengal is grand, but the check-in process was a bit slow. Beautiful heritage property though.
managerReply: We apologize for the delay during check-in. We are actively working on speeding up our reception process.

comment: Best budget stay in Kolkata. The rooms are clean and the WiFi is super fast!
Loved the heritage feel, but the room was quite drafty at night. Needs better window maintenance.
managerReply: Thank you for the feedback, Sneha. We are looking into improving our window insulation immediately.

comment: Waking up in the middle of Lake Pichola is a dream come true. Pure luxury and romance!
managerReply: Dear John, Thank you for choosing us for this special moment. We would love to welcome you back!

comment: Fantastic beach resort with perfect sunset views. The spa is world-class!
managerReply: Thank you, David! We're thrilled you enjoyed our spa. Come back for more relaxation!

comment: Beautiful marine drive view! Food was excellent. Could improve the gym facilities.
Exceptional service and amenities. The spa treatment was incredible. Highly recommended!
managerReply: We are honored to have hosted you. Your satisfaction is our greatest reward!

comment: Great location in the city center. Breakfast was adequate, but room could be bigger.
managerReply: Thank you for staying with us. We are always upgrading our suites for guest comfort.

comment: Ultimate luxury experience! Personal butler service is outstanding. Worth the splurge!
River view is magnificent! Infinity pool at sunset was magical. Excellent staff!
managerReply: Dear Sneha, we loved hosting you. The sunset from our pool is indeed special!

comment: Garden city vibes in Bangalore! Excellent service and beautiful architecture.
managerReply: Thank you for appreciating our palace design. We look forward to your next visit!

comment: Perfect honeymoon destination! Beach access, water sports, and amazing spa. Pure bliss!
managerReply: Congratulations on your honeymoon! We are honored to be part of your special memories.

comment: Pink City heritage at its best! Spa was rejuvenating. Cultural tour was informative.
Beautiful gardens, excellent dining options. A bit pricey but worth it for special occasions.
managerReply: We appreciate your visit to our heritage property. We hope to welcome you again!

comment: Private beach access is amazing! Water sports activities were fun and well-managed.
managerReply: Thank you, Amit! Our beach and water sports are second to none. See you next vacation!

comment: Modern design and excellent value for money. Cliff view was breathtaking.
Premium service in the diplomatic area. Fine dining restaurants are exceptional!
managerReply: We are delighted you enjoyed our fine dining experience. Visit us again soon!

comment: Excellent spa facilities. Central location is convenient. Rooms could be more spacious.
managerReply: Thank you for your feedback. Our spa is indeed our pride. We appreciate suggestions!

comment: Nice fort view and budget-friendly. Basic but clean rooms. Good for short stays.
